title: Which products has Marvell Technology made? And which ones are currently most important? - Quora

response.answer_text: In general Marvell dies not build/sell 'products' - it builds components.Some notable ones:- Silicon for hard-disks read/write 'head'- Main Silicon for cell phones- ARM architecture CPU's - Silicon in Google TV and Chromecast- Silicon for LED lights- Silicon for Video manipulation   (Conversion, Upscaling, etc)- Networking SiliconEtc etc.
